ATTR_INDICATOR_NOTE_OF_SOURCE: The indicator assesses whether a country is a participating state in the Montreux Document. The Montreux Document is the first international document to reaffirm the international legal obligations of States regarding the activities of private military and security companies. It also contains a series of best practices designed to help States take appropriate measures to comply with their obligations under international law.
